Title: Directs courts to consider a principal's primary residence in relation to the court as a factor in determining whether to fix bail
Summary: Adds the location of a principal's primary residence as a factor the court shall consider in determining whether to fix bail.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to directing courts to consider a principal's primary residence location in relation to the location of the court they are required to return to for a future appearance as a factor in determining whether to fix bail
